title: Carlo Ratti reveals mobile mini cauldron for Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Games
full_text: Carlo Ratti reveals mobile mini cauldron for Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Games. Italian architect Carlo Ratti has created a "mobile relay cauldron" to accompany the torches for the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympics, which have been showcased in front of iconic Milan landmarks ahead of the games. Designed and produced by Ratti's studio Carlo R….
